description: A beautiful corner unit townhouse in On the Course II by Dawson + Sawyer, part of a boutique 22-home community backing onto The Hills at Portal Golf Course. Lush green space outside the windows provides privacy and peaceful views, with abundant natural light in an open-concept layout.Features include soaring ceilings, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, gas range, oversized kitchen island, and durable laminate flooring. Spacious patio with natural gas hookup, double car garage plus driveway parking.Pet-friendly, well-managed complex with clubhouse, playground, and community garden, within walking distance to Douglas Elementary, Dufferin Park, and Peace Arch Provincial Park, in the sought-after Summerfield neighborhood of South Surrey.
